name: UKRAINE FOCUS
description: Not-for-profit organization dedicated to bringing humanitarian aid to Ukraine
sampleDescriptions: Monitoring federal funding within the 2024 Ukraine Supplemental on behalf of client, specifically to support health care infrastructure, medical supplies, ambulances, and humanitarian aid to Ukraine.
